info.title: WiseBite Backend API - Development
info.description:
## WiseBite API
    
    A comprehensive food marketplace API that connects customers with local vendors selling surplus food at discounted prices.
    
    ### Key Features:
    - **Authentication**: User registration and login with JWT tokens
    - **User Management**: Customer and vendor profiles
    - **Store Management**: Vendor store registration and management
    - **Food Items**: CRUD operations for food items
    - **Surprise Bags**: Discounted mystery food packages
    - **Orders**: Complete order management system
    - **Notifications**: Real-time notifications
    - **Chat**: Messaging between customers and vendors
    - **Transactions**: Payment processing and history
    
    ### User Roles:
    - **Customer**: Browse and purchase food items
    - **Vendor**: Manage stores, food items, and orders
    - **Admin**: System administration
    
    ### API Documentation:
    - **Swagger UI**: Available at `/docs` (this page)
    - **ReDoc**: Available at `/redoc`
    - **OpenAPI Schema**: Available at `/openapi.json`

post.description: Standard OAuth2 login. The 'username' is the user's phone number.

ADAPTED: Single endpoint to sign up a CUSTOMER or a VENDOR.
The 'role' field in the request body determines the user type.

patch.description: Update the password of the current authenticated user.

post.description: Upload a new avatar image for the current authenticated user.

schema.title: Response Get Notifications Api V1 User Me Notifications Get
Response Get Notifications Api V1 Notifications  Get
Response Get Conversations Api V1 Chat Conversations  Get
Response Get Messages Api V1 Chat Conversations  Conversation Id  Messages  Get
Response Get Transactions By User Api V1 Transactions User  User Id  Get
Response Get Transactions By Order Api V1 Transactions Order  Order Id  Get
Response Get Transactions Api V1 Transactions  Get

get.description: Vendor gets their own store profile.

patch.description: Vendor updates their own store profile.

get.description: Get public details of any store by its ID.

post.description: Vendor creates a new regular food item for their store.

get.description: Vendor lists all regular food items for their store.

schema.title: Response Get My Food Items Api V1 Food Items My Items Get

get.description: CUSTOMER: Get a list of all available surprise bags from all stores.

schema.title: Response Get All Active Bags Api V1 Surprise Bags  Get

post.description: Vendor creates a new Surprise Bag for their store.

get.description: CUSTOMER: Get details of a specific surprise bag.

post.description: CUSTOMER: Creates a new order from a list of surprise bags in their cart.

get.description: CUSTOMER: Get their own order history.

schema.title: Response Get My Orders Api V1 Orders Me Get

get.description: VENDOR: Get all incoming orders for their store.

schema.title: Response Get Orders For My Store Api V1 Orders Vendor Me Get

post.description: VENDOR: Confirms a customer has picked up the order. This completes the order and transaction.

OrderConfirmPickupRequest.title: OrderConfirmPickupRequest
OrderConfirmPickupRequest.description:
ADAPTED: Replaces OrderCompletionRequest.
Used by a Vendor in the Merchant App to confirm a customer has picked up their order.
This action would trigger the completion of the transaction.

UserRole.title: UserRole
UserRole.description: ADAPTED: Roles are now Customer, Vendor, Admin
